algorithm_technique: Graph traversal (DFS) to find connected components, then managing online status and fallback logic.
problem_summary_simple: Handle power station maintenance checks, rerouting to the lowest ID online station if the target is offline.
problem_summary_technical: Uses DFS to identify connected components (grids). Manages online status and uses pre-sorted component lists to find the smallest online ID efficiently.
key_insights: The core idea is to group stations into connected components (grids).
Maintaining the smallest online station ID within each component is key.
Processing queries offline and then efficiently finding the fallback station is important for performance.
